website_summaries.verdict: A practical, flexible flashlight that's great for camping trips and emergency bags. And it can charge your phone in a pinch.
pros: Pulls triple duty as a flashlight, lantern and red emergency light
Charges via USB, built-in solar panel or emergency hand crank
cons: Cranking for one minute only yields about 2 minutes of light

website_summaries.verdict: 3 light modes, multiple charging options, USB port, and fast charge time make this the most adaptable solar-powered flashlight available.
pros: Charges via solar, hand crank, or USB
Flashlight, red emergency light, and floodlight modes
Built-in USB cable powers smartphones and tablets
cons: A fairly expensive, but extremely versatile flashlight

customer_reviews.title: Great--at first
customer_reviews.text: I bought my unit straight from Goal Zero. I keep it on the porch banister during the day and use it to walk to the barn or around my property in the evening as necessary. The unit gets used up to 10 minutes each night. This flashlight worked great for the first 6-8 months. Then, it suddenly stopped working. I sent it back to Goal Zero, and the sent me a new unit. That process took a couple of weeks. The second unit that they sent me lasted about the same about of time. For a flashlight that costs >$75, it should last much longer. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Had this flashlight for about a year now.
customer_reviews.text: Had this flashlight for about a year now. I wasn't to sure about it at first. First impression, it was a little awkward to hold. This flashlight was given to me out of a kit that was headed to Puerto Rico after the hurricane. It has a lithium battery, so it was not allowed on a flight. I am surprised at how useful this flashlight is. Its super versatile. The shape allows you to position it a any number of ways to give you a stable light source. The 2 hooks in the back... make sit even better. Been using outside and have bumped it around and dropped it a bunch. I use the floodlight the most. So far, awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Angel I. Franco

customer_reviews.title: Black rubber/plastic parts start to get sticky after a year.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome and worked great. After 2 years, the black rubber and plastic parts started to get really sticky like they were melting off. Also, I have not used this product outdoors or under any extreme conditions. This is used indoor as a house flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: py

customer_reviews.title: inadequate product
customer_reviews.text: They've used the completely wrong materials for this product - after a few weeks the side with the solar panel has become sticky and has attracted all sorts of dirt and scuff marks that can't be removed. I've only had it a few months but looks years old. If I had known I would have kept in indoors. Not at all rugged. Also, the solar panel is inadequate for the torch. If I run the torch down by about 30% it takes about 4 days of continual charging to get it fully charged. How is this product going to keep up with all your gadgets when it can't even charge itself up after a full day of sunlight
customer_reviews.author: cayman

customer_reviews.title: This is our favorite flashlight. It is completely solar powered
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite flashlight. It is completely solar powered, works are as lantern and a flashlight, as well as a charger for your phone. It also has a USB port. The flashlight is powerful unlike some other solar powered ones we have tried to before. We received it as a gift a couple years ago and have purchased it for others as a gift too.
customer_reviews.author: GJF

customer_reviews.title: Very useful. Will update review when I solar charge it.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a sucker for a brand name...yes. This light is very useful. Charges pretty quick. Haven’t solar charged it yet. Will update the review when I do. The crank works great
customer_reviews.author: Todd Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Works great for emergency light
customer_reviews.text: I am using this flashlight for emergencies in our home and for use when we are camping. At hoe, after an initial charge via the USB, I keep it in a window so it will always be charged. After use, it does take a while to recharge via solar, but what can you expect from such a small panel? When camping, it is great for finding the bathroom at night using the spotlight and it is good for reading using the diffuse light. It has been exposed to rain, but not dunked in water. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Marr-Leisy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Goal zero products are the best. Excellent workmanship easy to use this is my fourth purchase from this company
customer_reviews.author: JackieO'

customer_reviews.title: one of my most important
customer_reviews.text: Of all the standby, emergency items I have, this is one of my most useful, most dependable, most versatile. I am so glad I spent more to purchase this item. If only it could make coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Bought Two!
customer_reviews.text: I like mine so much I bought one for my son. Very versatile and rugged. I love that I can recharge it from USB and keep the charge up with the built in solar panel.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Jon

customer_reviews.title: Goal Zero is great
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few goal zero products and this turned out to be one of my favorites. It's all a tad pricey but I find it to be worth it when years later the stuff still works and looks like new through backpacking and camping. Great alterative to the bigger lantern if you need something more sleek.
customer_reviews.author: SHelm

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I'm looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love how it is rechargeable in multiple ways: through solar, USB port and manual crank. Stored mine fully charge for more than a month or so and when I opened it, the light is still as bright as newly charged. Has an emergency light as well. No regrets on getting this flashlight
customer_reviews.author: Mayet

customer_reviews.title: It has a hand crank, bright light, and it’s solar.
customer_reviews.text: We have other pieces to this flash light. When Harvey hit here in Houston this flashlight would of been great to have. We have a small solar panel to charge the phone. It a very nice light to have.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works well if you get it charged before you ...
customer_reviews.text: This works well if you get it charged before you go. The light is bright and it charges my phone while camping for a weekend without electricity hookup. I'm not sure if the solar panel really does its job. I haven't been able to charge it back up in the sun even after leaving it on the dashboard all day, it didn't charge. The crank is too small to actually sit there and crank it. I suppose if I was lost in the woods at nighttime, I would be thankful for the crank.
customer_reviews.author: dbelle88

customer_reviews.title: Really a great product, took it camping a few times and ...
customer_reviews.text: Really a great product, took it camping a few times and the flood light worked great. I like that the flood is a directional light, unlike a lantern that shines everywhere. And the solar recharge ability worked great, i never had it completely drain over a 3 day weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Luke D.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flashlight. Very bright (though I've seen brighter), and very functional. The green cap on the hand crank tends to come loose. Other than that, I have no concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Varnon

customer_reviews.title: Must have idem for home or car
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad. I have had one for a year and love it. Even used it to charge my cell phone when camping.
customer_reviews.author: KCJones

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased this for my emergency kit and it is awesome. It is a little large but it does ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my emergency kit and it is awesome. It is a little large but it does have the crank and solar panel so that is probably by design. It is very easy to use and the light will last for about 7 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Battery wouldn’t re charge after a week and used only 2 times
customer_reviews.text: JUNK!!!! All my other goal zero has been good but stay away from This. The battery would only charge from the hand crank. Solar and sun charge only worked the first week.. really really disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for everything
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for everything!! Lost power for three days and was able to keep the cell phones charged and walk around the house at night!! Bought 3 more for family gifts!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Goal Zero
customer_reviews.text: My son-in law runs a farm. He loves this light. He keeps it available for night use and can charge his cell phone when he forgets. I have the older model without us charge. I love mine too. You can lay it in the sun to charge. Every home should have this light for emergencies or just night time use.
customer_reviews.author: Graham-Cracker

customer_reviews.title: I like the ability to charge other devices and hand crank ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid build, bright light, I like the ability to charge other devices and hand crank option. I keep this one in trunk due to size, helpful if phone runs low battery
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: An absolutely fantastic torch. Has everything I want in a flashlight ...
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely fantastic torch. Has everything I want in a flashlight but 2 things. Durability and water resistance. It deserves 5 stars regardless, because of the multiple power sources, charging capabilities, excellent design and quality, as well as sheer battery life. It really is brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Not a solar charger
customer_reviews.text: Took it camping with me, when we left it had a full charge. I was able to get a partial charge on my phone before it died. I then left it in full sun on a hot day and it didn’t charge at all. 10/10 do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Oxley

customer_reviews.title: awesome light
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing all the time and have bought several as gifts. Very bright, holds charge well, and the phone charger has been a life saver several times.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Thomas

customer_reviews.title: So sad I had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this flashlight and it did not charge at all! The only function that actually worked was the hand crank! So sad I had high hopes! I returned it and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping and the car
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for camping and the car. Multi charging options are great! you can crank it, plug it in or charge with the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted/needed. I love the options of usb charge, hand crank or solar charge. This is light weight. It seems durable. It has a hook on the end of it so you can hang it to charge or to use it. Very nice goal zero product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hanse

customer_reviews.title: I travel all over the world and I carry this ...
customer_reviews.text: I travel all over the world and I carry this in my baggage. This can charge you phone can light the way in a dark hotel stairwell in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great but is big and heavy for a flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but it is bulky for a regular use flash light. We use this for power outrages primarily or when car camping. It is heavy and bulky for backpacking. Goal Zero makes great products and for the right use this product is great!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend. I help take care of seniors and thiese were extremely helpful in blackout. I keep one in every room and my car!
customer_reviews.author: MARIA S

customer_reviews.title: Nice camping addition
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected; looking forward to using on overland trip to NM, AZ, CO and UT
customer_reviews.author: R. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I keep it on my windowsill to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I keep it on my windowsill to ensure it's always charged. I have used it during power outages and it worked great for both light and to keep my phone charged. The hand crank is definitely slow to charge, but it's nice to know I can at least hand charge it to get light at night if the battery is depleted.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Nice design.. Bad performance!
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight has a nice design and the solar does charge well.... HOWEVER.... the actual battery has a poor charge duration. Just 60 days in the closet left the battery at less than 25% after putting it away with a full charge. For an emergency light, this is extremely bad. Most emergency lights and even most regular batteries don't lose a charge this fast. A standard cheap battery operated flashlight would out perform this light in an emergency after 60 days storage. I can not recommend this light as is. I would suggest holding off until a newer updated version with better battery shelf life comes to market.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Present for my son
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the flashlight , until he lost it !
customer_reviews.author: Daaana

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about this flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Goal Zero Torch 250 that we have purchased. We use the first one for ourselves and bought the other two as gifts for others. It is reliable, it functions perfectly and throws out a huge amount of light. I like everything about this flashlight! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: The Solar-powered Flashlight I've Been Dreaming Of
customer_reviews.text: This is the solar powered torch I have been dreaming about. It is versatile, easy to charge, holds a charge really well, and provides a lot of light in the amound needed for the job. Now, if a company will come up with a solar headlamp of the same quality, I would be even happier.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Liestman

customer_reviews.title: Goal Zero Torch 250 Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Gave these as Christmas gifts to the men in my family & they loved them.
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind emergency back up system
customer_reviews.text: Well thought out emergency system for lighting and backup phone charger. Impressed with sturdy build. Peace of mind to have hand crank and solar light as battery back ups. Will buy more as holiday presents for loved ones. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A handy little tool we have used for camping and whenever we forget to bring a charger.
customer_reviews.author: Oziel Magana

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: An amazing product. I think everyone should have one. 3 different lights with 2 settings each, and they are very bright. Hand crank is easy but very strong and it is well built. I will definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: kevin bruso

customer_reviews.title: Definitely as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Loved this so far! Charges decently through solar and cranking is nice in case of emergency. The lights flash while charging is in progress. The USB charges the device the fastest. I ran this all night on a trip in lantern mode and it only went down 1 dot (of 4). Would definitely recommend this for campers, backpackers, and travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: This is seriously the brightest and best flash light in my collection
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the brightest and best flash light in my collection. After buying one, I want three more. It charged my iPhone 7 as fast as the wall charger. Seriously awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn D. Luther

customer_reviews.title: works great for keeping my phone charged over long bike trips
customer_reviews.text: First one that I received had a broken crank charger but was quickly replaced with a functional one. works great for keeping my phone charged over long bike trips.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a week long trip and the solar panel nor hand crank worked. Once the battery died it became dead weight on the raft. I should have tried it out first, my bad.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great torch / lantern
customer_reviews.text: Very bright lights. 5 mins winding gave 40 mins of light which I think is very good. Good build quality. Solar panel needs quite bright sunlight but with the winding efficiency this shouldn't slow you down. I must also recommend Goal Zero's outstanding customer service dealing with my queries swiftly and effectively
customer_reviews.author: strthnt@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flashlight. Holds a charge for quite some time
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flashlight. Holds a charge for quite some time. Got it for hurricane season since it has the hand crank and can charge my phone in a pinch, but it has quickly become my go to flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Lighting is great, flexible charging capability.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, very useful for all occasions. The battery lasts longer than specified, and the solar charging works well. Very handy to charge my phone when out on the trail. Very useful lighting capability, great for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: W. Loftin

customer_reviews.title: Love it, great gift to give
customer_reviews.text: I use this light all the time. I keep it near a window and it is always charges. I also charge my phone off of it.
customer_reviews.author: steve feller

customer_reviews.title: Goal Zero wins again with another great product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. A little on the big side but not too big. Goal Zero is an excellent company that has excellent support. Had an issue with a different product and they sent me a new one and I did not have to ship bad one back.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Howard

customer_reviews.title: Battery & light only.
customer_reviews.text: Solar & crank take f- o- r- e- v- e- r. Nice battery, nice light.
customer_reviews.author: eternalfreq

customer_reviews.title: terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: really wish i returned this product before the closing window, flashlight is very bright but terrible battery life. disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alisol

customer_reviews.title: Good flashlight.
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job, high quality but a bit pricey. Bigger/ bulkier then I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: SpiritSplit

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flash light lantern combo, may seem expensive, but it's every bit worth it! Not only is it solar, but you can also plug it into a outlet to charge it faster. You also can charge you phone on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy G. Slauson

customer_reviews.title: You want a SOLAR LIGHT!? Buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Great Product! Goal Zero made a quality solar powered light. The crank actually works exceedingly well in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie S.

customer_reviews.title: Woulda, Coulda, Shoulda
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product a 5 Star rating if it had a plug for the Light-a-Life lanterns.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cryer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for stormy weather, good for bug out bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sixto

customer_reviews.title: This thing is Awesome! Great for when the power goes out in ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is Awesome! Great for when the power goes out in a snow storm and the ability to charge my cell is a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: William Coulter

customer_reviews.title: My torch doesn’t work try charging everyday nothing’s no after ...
customer_reviews.text: My torch doesn’t work try charging everyday nothing’s no after a month please let me know how to resolve this issue thank you kindly
customer_reviews.author: Luis A.luevanos

customer_reviews.title: Best flashlight I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best flashlight I've ever owned. Charges via USB, solar, or emergency crank. Acts as a USB battery for phone and tablets. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: RickM

customer_reviews.title: Not for Hand Crank Charge
customer_reviews.text: Do not expect to hand crank charge it. As soon as I started cranking I knew from the lack of resistance. Hand cranked it for over 1/2 hour going from the second to the third of four battery charge level leds. Not one battery level led change. Had to charge it from the USB charger overnight. Crank is not durable it is made of light plastic not even glass filled for extra strength. Solar panel is not a high output device either. Would not expect the light to fully charge with a day of full sun. Design is interesting with all the features, but certainly not a "go to" emergency light.
customer_reviews.author: Lakehouse

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just got to take this on our first camping trip with it and it is a easy no fuss light. Not much to say really it does exactly what it says and is nicely featured with the light options.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Revak

customer_reviews.title: Great ight!
customer_reviews.text: Great mulit-purpose light/charger. My brother got this for me as a gift a year ago. I liked it so much I bought 3 more for my wife and kids to keep in the cars.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I love this flashlight. It's great for traveling, camping or just having in the house if your power goes out. I think the USB port is awesome and it does work well. I can charge both my iPhone and iPad with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol P Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great reliable product
customer_reviews.text: Great reliable product. It can fully charge at least two iphone 5s. I wish it has a hole for keychain.

customer_reviews.title: great emergency light source
customer_reviews.text: Have these in the house for emergency's. the light is super bright and they stay charged.

customer_reviews.title: She absolutely loved it. Lights are very bright
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my stepdaughter (28) who's always on the road for work... She absolutely loved it. Lights are very bright. Couldn't be happier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good flashlight and excellent charging battery, suitable for outdoor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: I really love the light for all of the features, everything has been thought about. It's a great light. I did drop mine from an approximate 7' ceiling to the floor and it broke, not in pieces but something between the battery and light, because none of the lights now work. I am ordering another one.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for many purposes
customer_reviews.text: Great product for many purposes. It charges pretty quick with a good sun. I keep this by my bedside and use it whenever. Love it!

product_meta.title: Goal Zero Torch 250 Flashlight, Lantern and USB Recharger with Integrated Solar Panel
product_meta.description: Color:One Color| Size:One SizeThe Torch 250 Power Hub and Flashlight is the most versatile, reliable source of power and light for any situation. Boasting a powerful, 4, 400 mAh lithium battery, 250 total lumen output, a 1. 5A USB port to charge your gear, as well as a built-in solar panel and hand crank, this multi-function flashlight is the only piece of gear you'll need in an emergency. Built-in USB charging cable, solar panel and hand crank for bright light anywhere. Red light for emergencies, USB port to charge your phone.
feature_bullets: Built-in solar panel, USB charging cable, and hand-crank for light anywhere
Multiple light options that allow to use as a 250 total lumen output flashlight, floodlight or red emergency light
Save on power with bright and half-bright modes
Long-lasting, advanced lithium 4400mAh battery and integrated USB port charges phones and boosts tablets to stay connected
